headline.main: War's Monthly Cost: $1 Billion and Rising

lead_paragraph: Officials in Congress and the Bush administration say that the United States initially expects to spend more than $1 billion a month on the war, and that the cost will probably rise rapidly as the Pentagon builds forces in Afghanistan. Article, Page B5.
